CustomField.formula: IF ( AND ( IncomingCallDate__c >= DATE (1868,09,08), IncomingCallDate__c <= DATE (1912,07,29)), "M" & TEXT ( YEAR ( IncomingCallDate__c ) - 1867 ) & "年" & TEXT ( MONTH ( IncomingCallDate__c )) & "月" & TEXT ( DAY ( IncomingCallDate__c )) & "日", IF ( AND ( IncomingCallDate__c >= DATE (1912,07,30), IncomingCallDate__c <= DATE (1926,12,24)), "T" & TEXT ( YEAR ( IncomingCallDate__c ) - 1911) & "年" & TEXT ( MONTH ( IncomingCallDate__c )) & "月" & TEXT ( DAY ( IncomingCallDate__c )) & "日", IF ( AND ( IncomingCallDate__c >= DATE (1926,12,25), IncomingCallDate__c <= DATE (1989,01,07)), "S" & TEXT ( YEAR ( IncomingCallDate__c ) - 1925 ) & "年" & TEXT ( MONTH ( IncomingCallDate__c )) & "月" & TEXT ( DAY ( IncomingCallDate__c )) & "日", IF ( AND ( IncomingCallDate__c >= DATE (1989,01,08), IncomingCallDate__c <= DATE (2019,04,30)), "H" & TEXT ( YEAR ( IncomingCallDate__c ) - 1988 ) & "年" & TEXT ( MONTH ( IncomingCallDate__c )) & "月" & TEXT ( DAY ( IncomingCallDate__c )) & "日", IF ( IncomingCallDate__c >= DATE (2019,05,01), "R" & TEXT ( YEAR ( IncomingCallDate__c) - 2018) & "年" & TEXT ( MONTH ( IncomingCallDate__c )) & "月" & TEXT ( DAY ( IncomingCallDate__c )) & "日", "")))))
CustomField.label: 入電時間（和暦）
